author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
The human body is surprisingly resilient. From kidneys and spleens to chunks of your liver and even part of your blood. 
Which organs can you safely lose? What happens when you do?
And how can science sometimes step in to replace the irreplaceable?

#kurzgesagt    
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science

title: How many organs can YOU live without? Turns out: More than we thought.
